tourdetail.tour_name: Panoramic scene in Ha Long Bay
tourdetail.description: Ha Long Bay in northeast Vietnam, is known for its emerald waters and thousands of towering limestone islands topped by rainforests. Ha Long Bay is suitable for enjoying a vacation with family, friends or colleagues. You will discover the majestic and mysterious scenes of Vietnam. Activity: rock climbing and hiking, particularly in mountainous Cat Ba National Park. Vehicle: Kayak
